verses.verse: It happened the same <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azzur,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> who was of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>speaks<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Within two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I bring <S%H7725>again<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> took <S%H3947>away<s%> from this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>

and I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> to this <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with all the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

even the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>Amen:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>so;<s%> Yahweh <S%H6965>perform<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> which you have <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> to bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and all them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to this <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H8085>hear<s%> you now this <S%H1697>word<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people:<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who have been <S%H6440>before<s%> me and <S%H6440>before<s%> you of <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries,<s%> and against <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and of <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who prophesies of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> when the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H935>happen,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H3045>known,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H571>truly<s%> sent <S%H7971>him.<s%>
Then <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4133>bar<s%> from off the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>'s <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and broke <S%H7665>it.<s%>

<S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Even so will I <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> within two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> from off the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bar<s%> from off the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> You have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bars<s%> of <S%H6086>wood;<s%> but you have <S%H6213>made<s%> in their place <S%H4133>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> on the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of all these <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5414>him:<s%> and I have given him the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the field <S%H7704>also.<s%>

Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2608>now,<s%> Hananiah: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5971>you;<s%> but you make this people to <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I will send you away from off the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth:<s%> this <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> because you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
So <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> the same <S%H8141>year<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
